== Early life ==

sentences: Early life ==
section: == Early life ==

sentences: Lindsay Lohan was born on July 2, 1986, in the Bronx borough of New York City, and grew up in Merrick and Cold Spring Harbor on Long Island, New York.
section: == Early life ==

sentences: She is the eldest child of Dina, and Michael Lohan.
section: == Early life ==

sentences: Her father, a former Wall Street trader, has been in trouble with the law on several occasions, while her mother is a former singer and dancer.
section: == Early life ==

sentences: Lohan has three younger siblings, all of whom have been models or actors: Michael Jr., who appeared with Lohan in The Parent Trap, Aliana, known as "Ali", and Dakota "Cody" Lohan.
section: == Early life ==

sentences: Lohan is of Irish and Italian heritage, and she was raised as a Roman Catholic.
section: == Early life ==

sentences: Her maternal antecedents were "well known Irish Catholic stalwarts" and her great-grandfather, John L. Sullivan, was a co-founder of the Pro-life Party on Long Island.
section: == Early life ==

sentences: She began home-schooling in grade 11.
section: == Early life ==

sentences: Lohan is a natural redhead.
section: == Early life ==

sentences: Lohan's parents married in 1985, separated when Lindsay was three, and later reunited.
section: == Early life ==

sentences: They separated again in 2005 and finalized their divorce in 2007.
